channel.title: Cookies on Loving my tummy
channel.description: Recent content in Cookies on Loving my tummy

item.title: Apple cinnamon oatmeal cookies
item.description: Peel and chop finely the apples (0.5 cm cubes or smaller). Preheat oven to 180째C (350째F) degrees. Line two 45x30 cm baking sheets with silicone baking mats or parchment paper. In a mixing bowl whisk together flour, oats, cinnamon, baking soda and salt for 20 seconds, set aside. In the bowl of an electric stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment cream together butter and brown sugar until combined. Mix in egg and vanilla extract.

item.title: Grandma's Cake
item.description: Prepare the Custard: In a saucepan, pour 1 liter of milk. Set aside one glass of cold milk. Heat the rest of the milk over medium heat. In the glass of cold milk, dissolve the 2 custard mix sachets and sugar to taste. When the milk in the saucepan is hot (without boiling), pour in the mixture from the glass, stirring continuously with a whisk until it thickens. Remove from heat and set aside.

item.title: Oat and Chocolate cookies
item.description: You can use wheat flour or any other kind of flour. I even recommend using ground oats as flour, in addition to the oat flakes. Preheat the oven with two baking trays lined with parchment paper. Mix the butter, sugar, and egg in a bowl. Add the remaining ingredients to the mixture except for the chocolate, and mix with a dough utensil until fully combined. Add the chopped chocolate and incorporate it evenly into the dough.

item.title: Oreo ice cream pop
item.description: Crush the cookies: Without opening the Oreo package, crush the cookies inside until they become fine crumbs. Add milk: Open the package slightly and pour in milk until it fills the package. Mix gently by shaking. Insert the stick: Pierce the package with the wooden stick, positioning it in the center. Freeze: Place the package in the freezer and let it freeze completely (about 4-6 hours). Unwrap: Once frozen, carefully remove the Oreo ice cream from the package.

item.title: Super banana cookie
item.description: Mix Ingredients: In a bowl, mash the banana until smooth. Add the egg, oat flour, vanilla extract, and cocoa powder. Stir until you have a smooth, thick batter. Shape the Cookie: Form a large cookie shape with the batter, or divide it into smaller portions if you prefer multiple cookies. Place parchment paper in the air fryer basket to prevent sticking. Cook in the Air Fryer: Preheat the air fryer to 180째C (350째F).
